description: Send a location tracking request to a user's devices.
permissions: Allowed for admins. Otherwise allowed when the requester shares broker, customer, trucker, or material supplier relationships with the requested user per UserLocationRequestPolicy; denied if none apply.
side_effects: Sends a push notification to the user's devices to start or stop location tracking.
validation_notes: --user is required. location_tracking_kind must be one of normal or continuous (defaults to normal when omitted). location_tracking_action must be one of start or stop (defaults to start when omitted). The requested user must have devices configured for push notifications and those devices must have push tokens.

flags.name: --location-tracking-kind
flags.description: Tracking kind (normal or continuous). Example: continuous.
flags.validation: must be one of normal, continuous

flags.name: --location-tracking-action
flags.description: Tracking action (start or stop). Example: stop.
flags.validation: must be one of start, stop
